system.appearance: Just like a normal spider, but about the size of a hill giant.

overview.base: You gain Climbing and Leaping.
You climb at half speed.
overview.proficient: You instead climb at normal speed.

overview.base: You vertically leap at quarter speed and horizontally leap at half speed.
overview.proficient: You instead vertically leap at half speed and horizontally leap at full speed.

overview.base: You resist unconsciousness and dropping due to being at negative HP. You still die when you reach half your maximum HP below zero.
You can see in the dark up to 60 feet as though it is dim light.

results.hit: Target is dead, ruined, and their SIZE is reduced by 1. If their SIZE was already less than 1, it is reduced to 0.

overview.base: You gain Improved Strength and Melee Damage Boost. In addition, you are no longer suffer the consequences of cumbersome items.
You gain Beastly Strength and Improved Armor Piercing.

Can wield two-handed weapons in one hand.
Note: AP weapons must still be wielded in two hands to be AV0.
Melee weapons you use are armor piercing.
You may spend an unused action to boost the triggering damage.
overview.proficient: You may spend an additional unused action to boost the triggering damage again.

system.trigger: You have hit a creature with a damaging melee weapon attack.

overview.base: You always have at least 3 AV. This is the case even when you are not wearing armor.
You cannot use items in your hands.

overview.proficient: The poison instead deals [[/roll 1d8[toxic]]] damage.
overview.fluent: The poison instead deals [[/roll 1d10[toxic]]] damage.

results.hit: Target is poisoned. The poison deals [[/roll 1d6[toxic]]] damage.
Target is snared.
results.critHit: The target automatically fails the first [[/roll 2d4]] roll.

system.endCondition: At the end of each of the target's turns, they roll [[/roll 2d4]]. If either of these dice roll a 4, this effect ends.

overview.base: Armor you wear is unbreachable.
You gain Bite and become fluent in it. Additionally, your mouth is AV0.

Your mouth counts as a weapon for the purposes of abilities that target or are delivered by it (although it cannot be shattered or destroyed). You may attack with it and its damage die is now [[/roll 1d4]].
overview.proficient: The damage die is instead [[/roll 1d6]].
overview.fluent: The damage die is instead [[/roll 1d8]].

overview.base: Target is snared.

system.endCondition: At the start of each of the target's turns, they roll [[/roll 2d4]]. If either of these dice roll a 4, this effect ends.

overview.base: Target is snared.

system.endCondition: At the end of each of the target's turns, they roll [[/roll 2d4]]. If either of these dice roll a 4, this effect ends.
